description: Learn Adobe's dedicated vector-based tool for designing and prototyping user experiences.

slides.title: What is Adobe XD?
slides.content:
# Adobe XD üíé

Part of the Adobe Creative Cloud.

A powerful, all-in-one tool for UI/UX design.

Key advantages:
- **Creative Cloud Initeraction:** Seamlessly import assets from Photoshop and Illustrator.
- **Performance:** Handles complex files with hundreds of artboards very quickly.
- **Repeater Grid:** Unique feature for lists.

slides.title: Design Mode
slides.content:
# Design Mode üé®

Where you create the visuals.

- **Artboards:** The screens of your app.
- **Assets Panel:** Manage colors, character styles, and components.
- **Responsive Resize:** Automatically adjusts group content when you resize the container.

slides.title: Repeater Grid
slides.content:
# Repeater Grid üîÅ

A killer feature in XD.

Select a group (like a contact card) and click "Repeat Grid". You can drag handles to repeat it horizontally or vertically.

- Update one, update all.
- Drag and drop a text file onto the grid to populate each item with unique data instantly.

slides.title: Prototype Mode
slides.content:
# Prototype Mode üîó

Switch from Design to Prototype tab to add interactions.

- **Wires:** Drag wires from objects to destination artboards.
- **Triggers:** Tap, Drag, Keys & Gamepad, Voice.
- **Voice Prototyping:** Trigger actions by speaking commands (Unique to XD).

slides.title: Trigger Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which trigger is unique to Adobe XD compared to many other tools?

slides.title: Auto-Animate
slides.content:
# Auto-Animate ‚ú®

Like Figma's Smart Animate.

XD figures out the differences between two artboards and animates the properties that changed.

Great for:
- Micro-interactions.
- Drag effects.
- Parallax scrolling.

slides.title: Components & States
slides.content:
# Components & States üé≠

Create a Master Component and Instances.

**Component States:** Define different visual states (Hover, Toggle, Active) directly on the component itself, making prototyping much cleaner (no need for duplicate artboards just for hover effects).

slides.title: Content-Aware Layout
slides.content:
# Padding (Stacks) ü•û

Similar to Figma's Auto Layout.

- **Stacks:** Use grouping with Stacks to let items push each other as content changes.
- **Padding:** Define background padding that stays consistent when text changes.

slides.title: Handoff (Share Mode)
slides.content:
# Share Mode üì§

Generate links for stakeholders and developers.

- **Design Review:** For clients to comment.
- **Development:** For devs to inspect code (CSS variable names), download assets, and seeing measurements.
- **User Testing:** Full screen interactive mode.

slides.title: 3D Transforms
slides.content:
# 3D Transforms üßä

Add depth to your designs.

You can rotate objects on X and Y axis to create 3D tilt effects or AR/VR concepts.

Simply click the 3D cube icon in the Property Inspector.

slides.title: Feature Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which tool allows you to easily duplicate lists of items?

slides.title: Plugins & Integrations
slides.content:
# Integration üîå

- **Creative Cloud Library:** Share colors and assets across Photoshop, Illustrator, and XD.
- **Plugins:** User Testing, Stark (Accessibility), Lorem Ipsum.
- **Export:** Easy export to After Effects for complex animations.

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: Adobe XD üéì

The Adobe ecosystem choice.

- **Repeater Grid:** Best in class for lists.
- **Voice Prototyping:** Unique interaction.
- **Auto-Animate:** Smooth transitions.
- **3D Transforms:** Easy depth effects.
- **CC Integration:** Works with Photoshop/Illustrator assets.
